about_the_game: Get a feel for Foepower's roguelite auto-battling gameplay with the free demo! You can play as the warrior up to max level - though you'll probably have a few lost heroes along the way... All the foepower you gather and invest will be saved and carries into the full game!
detailed_description: Get a feel for Foepower's roguelite auto-battling gameplay with the free demo! You can play as the warrior up to max level - though you'll probably have a few lost heroes along the way... All the foepower you gather and invest will be saved and carries into the full game!
name: Foepower Demo
short_description: Foepower is a roguelite auto-battle RPG with a vintage feel.  Send heroes into the mountain to level up, gear up, and extract the all-important Foepower - because you'll need it to strengthen the next hero!
